After a weekend of CoD Ghost I'm back

What did I miss?
not much....was it any good?

not much....was it any good?

Oh yeah

I had to borrow a neighbors PS3 to play and I had to play in black and white due to the cables he let me borrow but it was still great

Defiantly re-done

online gameplay is still kinda the same with a few changes but the new create a class (now called create a soldier) is amazing

Ok everyone, I'm releasing the Drekevak Fifteen-II.

New 51 ton light cruiser Drekevak Fifteen-II. 2 ASMs, 2AFMs, with room for more and the abillity to carry 2 drop tanks. Ideal for the small navy; this ship can operate by itself against fighters or cruisers. And only 224 parts.

Since it's so light, both craft files lack a launcher. Feel free to put your favorite radially mounted launcher on it, or Hyper edit it to orbit.

DOWNLOAD
